q: the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week.`` We need to completely rethink the minivan,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products that can still carry a lot of people but won't look like traditional minivans. 's relationship to the Administration is particularly timely now in light of the way the Federal Trade Commission closed its probe of the Wi-Spy incident, and the Department of Justice's current review of the pending acquisition of ITA Software. http://insidegoogle.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/GOOGGovfinal012411.pdf http://insidegoogle.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/LtrIssa012411final.pdf The report, Lost in the Cloud: Google Inc. and the US Government, is drawn from records obtained through the Freedom of Information Act and interviews.
